p: Furthermore, due to another WHO report from the 2019 year, about 68,000 cases of Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV) are estimated each year globally, with about 13,600â€“20,400 lethal infections ( Dengue, 2020). In the case of dengue virus (DENV) in the 2015 year, 3,312,040 cases and 4032 deaths were noticed ( Japanese, 2020). 6640 cases of Zika virus (ZIKV) and 1 case of death were reported in the North, Central, and South America in the 2019 year ( Paho, 2020). 463 cases and 50 deaths caused by WNV were reported in the European Union, as reported by the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDPC) ( europa, 2020).
